pv.name: CTRL-SUP-SYSM:H0-SYSHLTS
pv.description: Any one of CPU, MEM, Disk or FD of the host is in alarm state

guidance.title: System resource utilization is high
guidance.details: Check the mentioned alarm load and identify the cause

guidance.title: System resources related to the alarm
guidance.details: 1 - CPU utilization high (CPUUTL) : CPU utilization is high 2 - Memory utilization high (MEMUTL) : Memory utilization is high 3 - CPU, Mem util high (CPUUTL, MEMUTL) : CPU and Memory utilizations are high 4 - Disk utilization high (DISKUTL) : Disk utilizations are high 5 - CPU, Disk util high (CPUUTL,DISKUTL) : CPU and Disk utilizations are high 6 - Mem, Disk util high (MEMUTL,DISKUTL) : Memory and Disk utilizations are high 7 - CPU, Mem, Disk util high (CPUUTL,MEMUTL,DISKUTL) : CPU/Memory/Disk utilizations are high 8 - FD utilization high (FDUTL) : FD utilization is high 9 - CPU, FD util high (CPUUTL,FDUTL) : CPU and FD are in alarm state 10 - Mem, FD util high (MEMUTL,FDUTL) : Memory and FD are in alarm state 11 - CPU, Mem, FD alarm (CPUUTL,MEMUTL,FDUTL) : CPU/Memory/FD are in alarm state 12 - Disk, FD util high (DISKUTL,FDUTL) : Disk and FD are in alarm state 13 - CPU, Disk, FD alarm (CPUUTL,DISKUTL,FDUTL) : CPU/Disk/FD are in alarm state 14 - Mem, Disk, FD alarm (MEMUTL,DISKUTL,FDUTL) : Memory/Disk/FD are in alarm state 15 - CPU,Mem,Disk,FD alarm (CPUUTL,MEMUTL,DISKUTL,FDUTL) : CPU/Memory/Disk/FD alarm

guidance.title: Corrective action
guidance.details: If any load is remained in high continuously, please contact maintenance service

guidance.title: Temporary actions to suppress
guidance.details:
Change the alarm limits or severity for each load in alarm state.
Ex1) alarm limits % caput CTRL-SUP-SYSM:H0-CPUUTL.HIGH 90 % caput CTRL-SUP-SYSM:H0-CPUUTL.HIHI 100
Ex2) alarm severity % caput CTRL-SUP-SYSM:H0-MEMUTL.HSV NO_ALARM % caput CTRL-SUP-SYSM:H0-MEMUTL.HHSV NO_ALARM

pv.name: CTRL-SUP-SYSM:P0-PLCHLTS
pv.description: Connection or frame of the communication for PLC configuration and state is invalid

guidance.title: PLC communication failed
guidance.details: The connection for configuration and state to PLC was broken or the frame is not correct

guidance.title: Causes related to the alarm
guidance.details: Timestamp update error (TIME) Data block header, footer or length mismatch (FERROR) Data block version mismatch (FVERS) Data block alive counter update error (ALIVEC) Frame lost due (FLOST) PLC communication broken (CFGSTAT) Lost a redundant CPU (CPU0-ALIVE, CPU1-ALIVE)

guidance.title: Corrective action
guidance.details: Check whether the PLC is running\n Check whether network is ok\n Contact maintenance service (if needed)
